mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_addr3) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2}, #{user_addr3})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set user_addr1 = #{user_addr1}, user_addr2 = #{user_addr2}, user_addr3 = #{user_addr3}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_email = #{user_email} where user_id = #{user_id}
